title: Peter Jennings: Focusing on agronomy to increase rice yields in Asia

tasks.task: Discuss the importance of appropriate management in farming.
subtasks: Recognize the speaker's observation about farm constraints in Asia and America.
Acknowledge the emphasis on focusing on agronomy.
Explain the need for a significant advancement in agronomy.
Reflect on the speaker's 50-year experience and skepticism about agronomic research from experiment stations.
Highlight the belief in conducting agronomy experiments and evaluations directly on farms under real conditions.
Stress the role of farmers in carrying out agronomic practices suggested by specialists.
Argue for the importance of involving farmers in the evaluation and proof of agronomic methods under practical farm settings.
